ModMetaData.name: Equipment Deterioration
ModMetaData.author: LimeTreeSnake
ModMetaData.description:
Do you want things to deteriorate with time and use? Vanilla Rimworld arbitrarily checks each day, each piece of apparel on each pawn, whether it should have it deteriorate by one point or not. However, this is not done for weapons and other carried items. This mod rectifies this amongst adding other features.
Features: -Option to remove vanilla deterioation thus with this mod it's possible to remove all deterioation. -Possibility to change chance of daily deterioation for equipment, apparell and items in inventory. -Possibility to increase deterioation damage for equipment, apparell and items in inventory. -Randomize damage done to equipment, apparell and items in inventory -Chance of deterioation damage whenever firing a gun. -Chance of deterioation damage whenever bashing with weapons.
-Special Thanks to- Jecrell: cause he is great and his code helped me a lot. Pardeike: cause of his work on Harmony. XeoNovaDan: For his suggestion regarding quality. LegendBraki: For his suggestion of disabling the vanilla deterioration.
-Links- https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=46890.msg445480 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1565674984
Updates: 2019-08-08 -Added more deterioation options, -option for quality affecting deterioation, -bugfix: weapons detoriating upon use no longer cause a null exception. -New mod settings interface. -XND Proper Shotgun support 2018-11-25 -resolved issue with turrets and other non-pawn things being calculated. 2018-11-19 -Added functionality for deterioration of weapons upon use. 2018-11-16 -Made the deteriorate value changeable through mod settings.
-License- You may use this code as however you want. However, do notify me as I'd love to hear if people find use of my code! :)
